    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: Profiler
        Reset the state of the profiler, and clear out all collected profile data.

        Call this if you want to use the profiler again, after having collected profiling data, finished profiling, and printed your profiling data.

        Specified by:
        reset in interface Profiler

      • finish

        public void finish()
            throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: Profiler
        Finish the profiling, which includes stopping and waiting for the termination of all on-going profiles, and then prepare the collected profiling data for printing. This method must be called before Profiler.printProfile(PrintStream, String) can be called.
        Specified by:
        finish in interface Profiler
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted while waiting for all on-going profiling activities to stop.

      • printProfile

        public void printProfile​(PrintStream out,
                         String profileTitle)
        Description copied from interface: Profiler
        Write out a textual representation of the collected profiling data, to the given PrintStream.

        The report will start with the given profile title, and will have a "sorted sample tree" printed for each of the profiled threads.

        Specified by:
        printProfile in interface Profiler
        Parameters:
        out - the print stream where the output will be written to.
        profileTitle - the title of the profile report.

      • countSamples

        public long countSamples()
        Description copied from interface: Profiler
        Count the number of samples or data-points collected so far. This method may run in linear time, and the result may be out of date by the time it is returned.
        Specified by:
        countSamples in interface Profiler
        Returns:
        A non-atomic count of the number of samples or data-points collected so far.

      • setSampleIntervalNanos

        public void setSampleIntervalNanos​(long nanos)
        Description copied from interface: Profiler
        Set the sampling interval, as the desired nanoseconds between samples.
        Specified by:
        setSampleIntervalNanos in interface Profiler
        Parameters:
        nanos - The desired nanoseconds between profiling samples.

      • profile

        public Profiler.ProfiledInterval profile​(Thread threadToProfile,
                                         long initialDelayNanos)
        Description copied from interface: Profiler
        Start profiling the given thread after the given delay in nanoseconds.

        The profiled thread will have its stack sampled, until either the test ends, or the returned resource is closed.

        Specified by:
        profile in interface Profiler
        Parameters:
        threadToProfile - The thread to profile.
        initialDelayNanos - The profiling will not start until after this delay in nanoseconds has transpired.
        Returns:
        A resource that, when closed, will stop the profiling of the given thread.

      • sleep

        private long sleep​(long baselineNanos,
                   long delayNanoes)

        private void record​(SamplingProfiler.Sample root,
